title: 怎么CurseForge我总是进不去
txt_content:

就算装了Adblock Plus也一样不可以

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
更换dns http://www.alidns.com/setup/

然后 win+r  输入cmd  然后再输入

ping www.curseforge.com复制代码

replies.author: note1
replies.txt_content:

然后 win+r  输入cmd  然后再输入
那么关于“请求超时”的情况怎么办？

replies.txt_content:
